description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.

Convert an address into coordinates (latitude and longitude). Straightforward and easy-to-use geocoding for US and Canadian addresses.

name: Geocoding with Geocodio
plugin_instructions:
Input your private API key at the plugin tab then use the GET call given by this plugin as a data source. Send the address text, for example 1600 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, or just the country or state or city name or zip code.

Store or use the coordinate and completed address received, the result will be a list, but the first result is the best one, so just use :first item.
